articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Here are some samples of projects I've completed throughout this semester.

articles.title: Humanitarian Assitance Sample
articles.description: Here is a sample of a project I created for my Humanitarian Assistance Course.
articles.contents:
For this project, we each conducted our own independent research on the international humanitarian assistance and development community. I decided to research the barriers to education for Syrian refugees in the countries in which they have been granted asylum.
Here is a sample of my work:

Here is a breakdown of the issue by the numbers:

articles.title: Juvenile Politics Sample
articles.description: Here is a sample of an op-ed piece I wrote for my Juvenile Law Course.
articles.contents:
For this assignment, we each conducted our own independent research on the juvenile justice system. I decided to research the process of trying children as adults and the factors that influence this decision within states across the country.
Here is a rough draft of my op-ed:
Juvenile Law Op-ed Rough Draft

articles.title: Welcome to My Blog
articles.description:
Welcome to my new blog, Aidan's Blog. I hope you enjoy 
reading what I have to say!
